TopicTitle: New Career, before 2.4/ 2.3.5 will be pic heavy

Articles.Content:
So I don't know if im just stupid or just bored, but I decided to start a new career in ksp just before the ARM pack and have decided to take you all with me.... till the very end! or the Klaw!

So I have already set up 2 missions and in my third,....will be posting pic of this mission soon.

Happy waiting!

3rd mission for A-PAT

Javascript is disabled. View full album

sorry about the random jump to mun encounter.

Edited April 1, 2014 by Tidus Klein

You are neither nor, you just like the game and have especially fun with the starting out phase.

I too started a new career yesterday, but I am using the Better Than Starting Manned mod for a fresh tech tree and some changes to the science.
Is that all 1 flight from Kerbin to Mun then Minmus? Is there enough to get back to Kerbin and can you share some information on your ship design?

umm ya a mun flyby and a minmus landing but I goofed and hit space bar above minmus and jettisoned my engine (face palm)

those last pics are me trying to push the pod
